comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of regular glass panes to produce
- y: number of tempered glass panes to produce

Definitions:
- x, y are non-negative integers representing the quantities of regular and tempered glass panes produced, respectively.

Extracted Constraints:
- Machine Time Constraint: 3x + 5y \leq 300 (total time on heating machine)
- Cooling Machine Time Constraint: 5x + 8y \leq 300 (total time on cooling machine)
- Non-negativity Constraint: x \geq 0, y \geq 0

Extracted Objective:
- Maximize 8x + 10y (total profit)
